extendedInfo.description: Pic Stitch is the best way to make collages of your photos. Get creative with freeform collages, cutouts, filters, borders, stickers, and text. Your friends will be amazed with what you can create. It's like photoshop with your fingers!Awesome features:* Import photos from your photo gallery, Facebook and Google image search* Simple touch gestures to rotate, resize, flick to delete* Double-tap a photo to edit photo, clip photo, adjust borders* Clip photos by outlining the area you want with your finger* Lots of backgrounds and stickers to choose from!Simple and intuitive touch gestures:- Tap to add photos and move them to front- Resize photos by stretching or pinching them- Rotate them with two fingers- Flick the photo to delete it- Add text in various fonts and colors- Tap-and-hold to move photo to the back of the collage- Double-tap a photo to clip photo, edit photo, add filter effects, or draw! "Superb!! It's good at editing. And when i'm lazy to upload my pics one by one,i can squeeze everything in one page.."- Ray Helmi"Awesome!Simply fantastic!!!! Exactly what I needed!!!!"- Alexa john.PicCollage is fast, fun and easy. It's the best way to create awesome collages of your friends and favorite stars, with stickers, text, web search!When you're done, share your collages on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, or email.

reviews.title: So many ads
reviews.comment: Had the apo installed less than a minute and saw 6 ads, then it crashed. DO NOT BOTHER INSTALLING.
reviews.author: Victoria Carter

reviews.title: DON\'T DO IT!!
reviews.comment: I installed this ap only for it to spam my phone with app\'s downloading themselves on here. STAY AWAY FROM THIS!  REMOVING THIS NOW. ..
reviews.author: Kimberlee Shock

reviews.title: Way too many ads
reviews.comment: Install it to use it and then immediately uninstall it because it puts all sorts of crap on your phone that you don\'t want
reviews.author: matt smith

reviews.comment: Horrible ads every 5 seconds and theyll show up as notifications do not download!
reviews.author: Daniel Dick

reviews.title: Not to beat a dead horse but...
reviews.comment: Never in my five years as an Android user have I ever had an app with this many ads. It\'s obnoxious!!!
reviews.author: Melissa Garcia

reviews.comment: Way too many ads. Cant even finish a picstitch. Had to delete.
reviews.author: Chelsea Fuller

reviews.title: Ads
reviews.comment: The pop up ads are ridiculous and unwanted, the app is good for what its used for, but the ads are annoying and unwanted. So close to uninstalling.
reviews.author: Molly Bauerly

reviews.title: All ads, all the time
reviews.comment: It\'s a shame this app is so obnoxious with its ads every 2 seconds while using and pushing spam ads to my notifications when I\'m not using it. The app would  great if it weren\'t for this. I\'m uninstalling. No app is worth this much garbage.
reviews.author: Erica Hunter

reviews.title: Spam App
reviews.comment: Uninstalling immediately. Had this on my iPhone, didn\'t have any problems. Downloaded it on my Android, spam central!! Right out the gate it asked me to approve all these spyware practices, and when I decline, they started spamming my phone anyway, right then! After over a year of usage, I\'ll never download or use this app again.
reviews.author: Kandi Queen

reviews.title: Ads
reviews.comment: I understand that if you buy this app that you wont have any ads. But there way too many ads. Every click you hit an ad pops up.  Deleting it
reviews.author: Samantha Wilson

reviews.title: Good app to many advertisements
reviews.comment: App works but u get advertisements ever 5secs
reviews.author: Joe Caputo

reviews.title: Too many ads! Popups!
reviews.comment: Horrible. I install and then immediately uninstall right after I use it. Stupid ads come up like you have won $1250!
reviews.author: Lena G

reviews.title: Slows phone down
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app despite all of the negative reviews, and decided to uninstall it within five minutes. Though you can choose to not grant it access to your notifications, the number of ads makes using it a waste of time. Though I\'ve force closed the app, my phone is running very slowly.
reviews.author: Parrian Parry

reviews.comment: It pixilated all my pictures when I put them in squares, and it has WAY too many advertisements. They\'re sent to my phone and interrupt me in the middle of putting pictures together! Only good for screenshots.... I strongly advise you look elsewhere!
reviews.author: Richard Ecuyer

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: It would be great if there was less ads
reviews.author: Nicole Sears

reviews.title: ads
reviews.comment: good app, but... TOO MANY ADS
reviews.author: Matthew Guillen

reviews.comment: Horrible. Crashes so much & so many ads!!!!
reviews.author: Sara Mills

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Tons of ads. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Matthew Sherman

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: I hate it . It doesnt work . Too many ads!!!
reviews.author: Starrla Welker

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: The ads are man man!!! I cant stand how I cant put together a stitch without a ad!!!!! Uninstalling for sure!
reviews.author: Kyle Beels
